item.title: Various Artists - This Old Man He Played One
item.description:
For educational use.
This Old Man by eFlashApps. It’s been digitally slowed down 8% so young students can play along. The original may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RKaxRYJ5AMY. It's in the key of C, so you can do it with diatonic Boomwhacker or diatonic color handbells.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
